name: Proof 376 — Sharing Bananas, Shared Survival
description:
On the morning of December 23, 2025, MaMee shares bananas with every dog at MaMeeFarm.
No hierarchy. No favoritism. Every life eats together.

This moment is not charity, not sentiment, and not performance.
It is a daily act of survival, care, and coexistence — recorded exactly as it happened.

In systems where support never arrives,
sharing becomes the only infrastructure that exists.

Captured as verifiable Ground Truth under the DGCP framework.

DGCP Classification

Proof-of-Life

Proof-of-Care

Proof-of-Continuity

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
